Name: Dry Martini (2:1 ratio) Wet
Ingredients: 2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of chilled Fragata Green Olive on stick or lemon zest twist.
Review: Reputed to be a favourite of HRH Prince Charles.
History: A generous measure of vermouth to two of gin, hence the name 'Wet' Martini. Dry Martini history .
